verses.name: Acts 20:19
verses.text: Serving the Lord with all humility of mind, and with many tears, and temptations, which befell me by the lying in wait of the Jews:

verses.name: Acts 20:20
verses.text: And how I kept back nothing that was profitable unto you, but have shewed you, and have taught you publickly, and from house to house,

verses.name: Acts 20:21
verses.text: Testifying both to the Jews, and also to the Greeks, repentance toward God, and faith toward our Lord Jesus Christ.

verses.name: Acts 20:22
verses.text: And now, behold, I go bound in the spirit unto Jerusalem, not knowing the things that shall befall me there:
